page.title: 14LOCAL NEWS
page.content: Kilkhampton home school association are holding a Summer Fayre on Saturday 29th June at 2pm.There will be games, refreshments,jumble sales and plant stalls.If you want to participate in the car boot sale,there is a charge of Â£2.50 to hire the pitch. On the 11th of June,Mr Michael Radford was rushed to a North Devon hospital where he died in the night of T.B.In Bude there are 400 people at risk.Two children from Kilkhampton have been tested for T.B. { Cricket:}Kilkhampton beat Bridgerule by two runs which puts them third in the league.First are Hartland with 20 points,second are Bridgerule with 15 points,then Kilkamptom with 15 points and last are Stratton with 5 points. On June 24th,Tracey Babb married Alan Hocking at Kilkhampton church.There were 4 bridesmaids and 70 people
